vialab.simpleMultiTouch.zones

Class Zone

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jdesktop.animation.timing.TimingTargetAdapter
      • vialab.simpleMultiTouch.zones.ZoneAnimator
        • vialab.simpleMultiTouch.zones.Zone
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jdesktop.animation.timing.TimingTarget
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CircleZone, PolyZone, RectZone

    public class Zone
extends ZoneAnimator
    This is the main zone class which RectZone and ImageZone extend. It holds the zone's coordinates, size, matrices, friction, etc.. It was done with help from the tuioZones library.

    University of Ontario Institute of Technology. Summer Research Assistant with Dr. Christopher Collins (Summer 2011) collaborating with Dr. Mark Hancock.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Erik Paluka

      • setFriction

        public void setFriction(float xF,
               float yF)
        Sets the friction for the x and y directions. Default frictions are set to 5000 for both.
        Parameters:
        xF - float - Friction in the x direction
        yF - float - Friction in the y direction

      • setChanged

        public void setChanged(boolean changed)
        Sets the flag 'changed' to the value of the boolean given as a parameter. If a zone's matrix has been changed, the flag should be set true.
        Parameters:
        changed - boolean - flag

      • setGestureEnabled

        public void setGestureEnabled(java.lang.String gestureName,
                     boolean enabled)
        Sets the zone to be able to respond to touch events. Gesture names include 'DRAG' 'XDRAG' 'YDRAG' 'RNT' 'TAP' 'TapAndHold' 'PINCH' 'XYPINCH' 'XPINCH' 'YPINCH' 'THROW' 'ROTATE' 'HSWIPE 'VSWIPE'. Gestures enabled with this method are handled by default.
        Parameters:
        gestureName - String - Gesture Name
        enabled - whether to turn the gesture on or off

      • setGestureEnabled

        public void setGestureEnabled(java.lang.String gestureName,
                     boolean enabled,
                     boolean handled)
        Sets the zone to be able to respond to touch events. Gesture names include 'DRAG' 'XDRAG' 'YDRAG' 'RNT' 'TAP' 'TapAndHold' 'PINCH' 'XYPINCH' 'XPINCH' 'YPINCH' 'THROW' 'ROTATE' 'HSWIPE 'VSWIPE'
        Parameters:
        gestureName - String - Gesture Name
        enabled - whether to turn the gesture on or off
        handled - true of processing of this gesture should stop after this zone

      • setScaleLimits

        public void setScaleLimits(float low,
                  float high)
        Set zone scale limits.
        Parameters:
        low - float - the lower limit of scale gesture (<=1), default is set to 0.3
        high - float - the upper limit of scale gesture (>=1), default is set to 5.0

      • setScaleSensitivity

        public void setScaleSensitivity(float val)
        Set zone scale sensitivity.
        Parameters:
        val - float - the sensitivity of scale gesture (default=1.0)

      • setTranslateAreaRadius

        public void setTranslateAreaRadius(float radius)
        Sets the radius of the area that will trigger only a translate event in the RNT gesture. Default is 50.
        Parameters:
        radius - float - the radius of the area

      • setXYWH

        public void setXYWH(int xIn,
           int yIn,
           int wIn,
           int hIn)
        Changes the coordinates and size of the zone.
        Parameters:
        xIn - int - The zone's new x-coordinate.
        yIn - int - The zone's new y-coordinate.
        wIn - int - The zone's new width.
        hIn - int - The zone's new height.

      • attachTo

        public void attachTo(Zone parentZone)
        Attach a zone to another zone. The attachment is a child/parent relationship. Default gesture actions will alter the child if the parent is manipulated, but not the other way around.
        Parameters:
        parentZone - Zone - the parent zone.

      • assignToGroup

        public void assignToGroup(java.lang.String group)
        Assign a zone to a group. A new group can be created here or an existing group can be used.
        Parameters:
        group - String - the name of the group. Can be a new group or existing.

        public void setActive(boolean active)
        Activate a zone so that it responds to touch. A zone is active by default.
        Parameters:

        public void setChildrenActive(boolean active)

      • isToggleOn

        public boolean isToggleOn()
        Determine the toggle state of the zone. If a zone has been touched an odd number of times, then its toggle state is true. Otherwise it is false.
        Returns:
        boolean True if toggle is on.

      • isActive

        Determine if zone is active.
        Returns:
        boolean True if active

      • preDraw

        public void preDraw()
        Pushes the current Matrix. Applies the zone's matrix. Draws the border of the zone if flag is 'drawBorder' is set to true

      • postDraw

        public void postDraw()
        The very last thing that gets called when you call the drawZone method.

      • drawZone

        public void drawZone()
        Gets overrided by the zones that extend this class. The student may also override this method in his/her Processing sketch.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the zone.
        Parameters:
        zone - Zone

      • contains

        public boolean contains(float x,
               float y)
        Tests to see if the x and y coordinates are in the zone. If the zone's matrix has been changed, reset its inverse matrix. This method is also used to place the x and y coordinate in the zone's matrix space and saves it to localX and localY.
        Parameters:
        x - float - X-coordinate to test
        y - float - Y-coordinate to test
        Returns:
        boolean True if x and y is in the zone, false otherwise.

      • addTouch

        public boolean addTouch(Touch t)
        The method which the user of this framework will override. By default, the touch does propagate to all the zones under the touch. When overriding this function in the zone's instantiation, return true if you do not want the touch to continue to propagate.
        Parameters:
        t - Touch - the "finger"
        Returns:
        true if the touch was handled

      • updateTouch

        public boolean updateTouch(Touch t)
        The method which the user of this framework will override. By default, the touch does propagate to all the zones under the touch. When overriding this function in the zone's instantiation, return true if you do not want the touch to continue to propagate.
        Parameters:
        t - Touch - the "finger"
        Returns:
        true if the touch was handled

      • removeTouch

        public boolean removeTouch(Touch t)
        The method which the user of this framework will override. By default, the touch does propagate to all the zones under the touch. When overriding this function in the zone's instantiation, return true if you do not want the touch to continue to propagate.
        Parameters:
        t - Touch - the "finger"
        Returns:
        true if the touch was handled

        Parameters:
        e - DragEvent - The DragEvent which encapsulates the event's information

        Parameters:

      • hSwipeEvent

        public void hSwipeEvent(HSwipeEvent e)
        Horizontal Swipe Event's default action is translating the zone in the x-direction by half of the horizontal swipe's distance.
        Parameters:
        e - HSwipeEvent - The Horizontal swipe event

      • vSwipeEvent

        public void vSwipeEvent(VSwipeEvent e)
        Vertical Swipe Event's default action is translating the zone in the y-direction by half of the vertical swipe's distance.
        Parameters:
        e - VSwipeEvent - The Vertical swipe event

      • tapEvent

        public void tapEvent(TapEvent e)

        Parameters:
        e - TapEvent - The tap event

      • tapAndHoldEvent

        public void tapAndHoldEvent(TapAndHoldEvent e)
        Tap and Hold Event's default action is rotating the zone 90 degrees.
        Parameters:
